text: Italo De Zan (1 July 1925 â€“ 9 March 2020) was an Italian racing cyclist. He won the tenth Giro d'Italia in 1948. He was born in San Fior. De Zan died of COVID-19 in Treviso on 9 March 2020 at the age of 94. == References == Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy
title: Italo De Zan
